term.title: enantiomerically enriched

item.text: A sample of a chiral substance whose enantiomeric ratio is greater than 50:50 but less than 100:0.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2207 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)

term.citation: Citation: 'enantiomerically enriched' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.E02071

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
